# FocusToggle

The `FocusToggle` puts the `ParticipantTile` in focus or removes it from focus.

## Import

```typescript
import { FocusToggle } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Remarks

This component needs to live inside `LayoutContext` to work properly.

## Usage

```tsx
<ParticipantTile>
  <FocusToggle />
</ParticipantTile>
```
